title: Beautiful Studio Steps from Campus and College Ave AVL NOW- D03
posting_body: ['Spacious Furnished Studio in Historic Berkeley Building - D3', 'Property Address', '2709 Dwight Way | Unit 03 | Berkeley, CA 94704', 'Available: NOW', 'Offered By', 'Staten-Palm LP', 'Description', 'Sign Up for a Tour Today!', '-->', '<URL>', "Don't miss out on this spacious studio furnished apartment- plenty of room for two roommates to share- in prime Berkeley location.", 'This property is located in the highly desirable Southside neighborhood.', 'Just a few short blocks from UC Berkeley and the ever-popular Elmwood Area.', 'The four-story property was constructed in the 1920s and still retains the charm of the period with wood floors, high ceilings, and spacious living quarters.', 'Amenities include a large secure bike room, on-site laundry with four washers dryers, wi-fi, secure entrance with a buzz in capability.', 'PROPERTY HIGHLIGHTS', '- Located just off College Avenue', '- 4 blocks to the UC Berkeley campus', "- 1920's building charm with hardwood floors and period details", '- Secure bike room and laundry facilities', '- The unit has lots of natural light', '- Short walk to BART', '- Quick access to 580, 80, 880, 24, and 13 Freeways', 'APARTMENT HIGHLIGHTS', '- Newly Refurbished Kitchen and Flooring', '- Red, Retro-Style Refrigerator and Microwave', '- Eat-In Kitchen', '- Large Main Living Room', '- Heater', '- Lots of Windows in Every Room', '- Walk', 'In Closet', '- Intercom with Buzz-In Capability', '- Floor: 1st', 'LEASE TERMS', '- Carport parking for $100/mo - inquire for availability', '- Tenant pays all utilities', '- High speed internet offered for $40/mo', '- Lease Duration: to 5/31/2023 or 07/31/2023 w/ option to renew', '- Cats welcome', '*Photos/video are of different apartment w/ same floorplan.', "NOTE: The City of Berkeley's Fair Chance Housing Ordinance requires that rental housing providers display this notice to applicants - https://www.cityofberkeley.info/uploadedFiles/Housing/Level_3_-_General/Fair_Chance%20Notice_to_Applicants_and_Tenants_English_Spanish_Chinese.pdf", 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1.0BA', 'Square Feet: 400', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,250.00', 'Available:', '06/13/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $4,500.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs not allowed']
